inputs.name: _spender
inputs.description: The address which will spend the funds.

inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: The amount of tokens to be spent.

abiDocs.name: approve
abiDocs.details: Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of msg.sender.   * Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729

inputs.name: _from
inputs.description: address The address which you want to send tokens from

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: address The address which you want to transfer to

inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: uint256 the amount of tokens to be transferred

abiDocs.name: transferFrom
abiDocs.details: Transfer tokens from one address to another

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: The address that will receive the minted tokens.

inputs.name: _amount
inputs.description: The amount of tokens to mint.

abiDocs.name: mint
abiDocs.return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

inputs.name: _owner
inputs.description: The address to query the the balance of.

abiDocs.name: balanceOf
abiDocs.details: Gets the balance of the specified address.
abiDocs.return: An uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address.

abiDocs.name: finishMinting
abiDocs.details: Function to stop minting new tokens.
abiDocs.return: True if the operation was successful.

abiDocs.name: transfer
abiDocs.details: transfer token for a specified address

abiDocs.name: increaseApproval
abiDocs.notice: approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) From MonolithDAO Token.sol

inputs.name: _owner
inputs.description: address The address which owns the funds.

inputs.name: _spender
inputs.description: address The address which will spend the funds.

abiDocs.name: allowance
abiDocs.details: Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.
abiDocs.return: A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
